message.body: hi!
do you see my photo when I'm gchatting? I just realized that it's there for me, but not sure if it will show up for your through the bot
Hi!
No, I don't see your photo
ok cool
how was your weekend?
pretty good. I play Ultimate Frisbee and we had tryouts on Saturday. Then I played bass at church on Sunday morning
Thinking about seeing Star Trek 2 tonight
how was your weekend?
frisbee sounds fun!
you play the bass? Stand up?
Mine was okay, my lil sister came and stayed over
We went to the Italian market festival, but it was raining on and off
that sounds awesome! I love the Italian market; I didn't realize there was a festival going on this weekend
Yeah, not the best weekend for it weather-wise, but we saw the procession of saints yesterday morning and went out to brunch
so it was cool
that sounds sweet
(I play bass guitar, so not stand up, unfortunately. I'd love to learn though!)
nice! Do you mostly play at at church or do you have a band?
just church. I used to have a band in high school but we all moved away for college
i tried a few times in and after college to get a band together but we ended up practicing a few times and then it kinda fell through
i guess as everyone gets older they get busy with work and school
So, you're gonna see the new start trek?
I wanna see that too. You going to the bridge?
yeah! they have deals with your college ID, depending on where you went
Monday is Temple, Tuesday is Penn, Wednesday is Drexel
Thursday is $5 all day for anyone
you can use your Penn staff ID also
and I have a temple ID too
That's awesome! I didn't know that!
$5 is super cheap
Do you live in west philly?
Yeah, so I got the Rave a lot. Though sometimes it sucks b/c you get ppl answering their phones during the movies etc
you kinda get what you pay for lol
but if you go on off nights, there's usually not too many people
haha true
Yeah I live near the riverview, but I hate going there cause it is too noisy and crazy on the weekend
The ritz is nice tho
the ritz has a nice selection b/c they're usually not shown at other theaters
and at the Rave sometimes they don't have the movies that I want to see
but it's so close and cheap i usually just deal lol
there used to be a "cheap theater" near my hometown ... back in the day it was like 2.50! and they showed movies that were out in the normal theater like 6months or a year ago
it was great!
kinda scuzzy tho! lol
There used to be a place in Maine that did that. We would go vacationing there and always stop by the theater, but it has since closed
I really want to go to Maine, never been there
what part did you vacation in?
York Beach, my aunt has a house there so we go every year pretty much
if you like seafood, Maine is a must!
but being by the ocean and seeing the lighthouses and stuff is cool too
and where we go has a bunch of outlets which is great for shopping :)
sounds really nice!
I need a vacation
Is the water too cold to swim in/
oh it's freezing
but i used to always go in when i was little
my dad used to say the only people who go in the water are little kids and Canadians b/c it's so cold
I like to go in cold water sometimes, you have to get up your courage and jump in ... you usually adjust to it after a few minutes
I've gone in the pool when the water was probably in the low 60s, maybe Maine is colder that that
i'm not sure how cold it is temperature wise, but i remember going in and my lips turning blue at one point
but i was (well, still am) very stubborn so I wanted to stay in longer lol
yeah kids never want to get out of the water
they'll be shaking cause they're so cold and want to get right back in
yeah, I've stopped going into the water lol
I'd rather just walk on the beach
the place i go also has an arcade and candlestick bowling which is really fun too
are you going this summer?
yeah, sometime in August
